TITLE: Hello! I am Sebastian

ME.TITLE: Let's work together
ME.TEXT:
I am a Front-end developer based in Willstätt, Baden-Würtemberg.
I enjay helping designers and campaniesbring their ideas into real life.
I am looking forward to continuing my developer position.

If youthinkI'd be a good match for your projects, contact me !

MYWORKTEXT:
This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to
try them out
JOINTEXT:
Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and
organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assignusers and
categories
SHARKIETEXT:
A simle Jump and run game based on object-oriented approach.
Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles tofight against the killer whale.

CONTACT.NAME: Contact
CONTACT.TEXT:

you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects
with my work.
